title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 5001.6 - Service credit for members of the retirement board who have been elected by the membership of the system
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 5001.6 - Service credit for members of the retirement board who have been elected by the membership of the system

State Regulations

Each member of the retirement board who has been elected by
the membership of the retirement system and has been granted a leave of
absence, pursuant to subdivision 6 of section
506
of the

Education Law, shall receive a year of service credit for each year of service
on the retirement board, or where such service is less than one year, credit
shall be granted in accordance with section
5001.2
of this

Part. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
5001.6

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
